# Elite Cache Nodes

This directory contains elite cache nodes for the Citadel Agent workflow engine.

## Overview
Elite cache nodes provide the most sophisticated and advanced caching mechanisms including:
- AI-powered cache optimization
- Cross-region distributed caching
- Auto-scaling cache clusters
- Predictive cache warming
- Advanced cache invalidation strategies

## Available Nodes
- `ai_cache_optimizer_node.go` - Optimizes cache performance using AI algorithms
- `cross_region_cache_node.go` - Manages distributed cache across multiple regions
- `auto_scaling_cache_node.go` - Automatically scales cache capacity
- `predictive_warming_node.go` - Uses prediction to warm cache contents
- `advanced_invalidation_node.go` - Implements sophisticated cache invalidation

## Usage
These nodes are designed for elite caching workflows with AI-powered optimization.

## Requirements
- Distributed cache infrastructure
- AI optimization systems
- Multi-region connectivity
- Auto-scaling capabilities
- Advanced monitoring systems

## Security & Permissions
- Requires distributed system management permissions
- Advanced cache infrastructure privileges

---

**Part of Citadel Agent v1** - Advanced Workflow Automation Platform
